desc: Verify that for an object the class of the object followed by a list of the properties is displayed.
Verify that for a primitive value the primitive value is displayed.
On line 16 hover the open and the closing bracket in 'foo.bar[4]'.
Verify that in both cases the whole identifier 'foo.bar[4]' is selsected and the according object is displayed in the tooltip.
On line 18 hover the tokens 'foo.bi' between the two brackets.
Verify that only the identifier between the brackets is selected and the according value is displayed.
Verify that nothing is selected and nothing displayed.
label: Tooltip features in JS source
